translation.text: Due to lightning strikes damaging equipment at Rockdale earlier some services in both directions are experiencing major delays. Some stopping patterns and platforms may still change at short notice, please listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps before boarding services.
due to lightning strikes damaging equipment at Rockdale
due to lightning strikes damaging equipment at Stanmore

From 5 October 2021 until 29 October 2021, escalator maintenance will be taking place at Kings Cross station. Please take care around the work area, follow directional signage at the station and speak to station staff if you require assistance.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9379 4833.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, ask staff or call 9847 8496.

The lift between the concourse and platform 5 is out of service until 22nd November due to maintenance.  For customers travelling to Ashfield from the city requiring lift, you may have to change at Burwood and catch a return service to Ashfield to complete your journey. If you require further assistance, please ask staff or phone 9752 8356.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1/2 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9752 8356.
The lift between the concourse and The Boulevarde is temporarily out of service. For any assistance, ask staff or phone 9563 7549.

The lift between the concourse and platform 1 will be out of service until the 15 December. If you require a lift you may need to travel to Hurstville for a return service to City. For assistance, please ask staff or call 9563 7273.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the footbridge is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 4349 9110.
The lift between the concourse and Queen Street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone  9851 7525.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6063489
Station Update - Allawah, Arncliffe, Banksia and more

Due to lightning strikes damaging equipment at Rockdale earlier some services in both directions are experiencing major delays. Some stopping patterns and platforms may still change at short notice, please listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps before boarding services.
Station Update - Canterbury, Dulwich Hill, Hurlstone Park and more
Due to Metro construction works platforms have a reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of the construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platforms.
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

The stairs from Richardsons Crescent to concourse are closed for maintenance work until November 2021. Access to platforms 2 and 3 is via platform 1 side entrance (off carpark on Richardsons Crescent). Entrance from Griffiths St is not affected.
Commuter parking has been reduced at Warwick Farm station until early 2022. For more information please see signage around the station or visit www.transport.nsw.gov.au/warwickfarm

From Sunday 17 October until Monday 20 December the lift from the concourse to platform 1 will be closed due to an upgrade. If you need lift access, catch a train from platform 3/4 for Metro access to North Shore stations or via Strathfield to the City. For help see stations staff or call 98478248.

Due to an external power supply issue affecting station infrastructure, there is currently limited power at Penrith Station. Station information Screens and Opal facilities may not be available as a result. 

Customers are advised to request a fare adjustment at transportnsw.info/Opal.

From Monday 27 September to Saturday 2 October the lift from Elizabeth Street into St James station will be closed for maintenance works. Please use Martin Place station if you require lift access during this period.
Commuter parking has been reduced at St Marys station. For more information please see signage around the station or visit www.transport.nsw.gov.au/stmarys

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Until November 2021, the escalators to Exit 1 (Wynyard Park) will undergo upgrade works. Please follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs or lift. If you need assistance, see station staff or call 9224 2959.
